list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in the body) a whitish fiber or bundle of fibers that transmits impulses of sensation to the brain or spinal cord, and impulses from these to the muscles and organs.
a person's steadiness, courage, and sense of purpose when facing a demanding situation.

brace oneself mentally to face a demanding situation.
